messages.title: THE CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION
messages.content: THE CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION IS BETWEEN A LABOUR OR A TORY GOVERNMENT.

messages.title: IS THIS WHAT YOU WANT TO WAKE UP TO ON FRIDAY MORNING?
messages.content: THE TORIES ARE PLOTTING A SECRET DEAL WITH UKIP. ONLY A VOTE FOR LABOUR CAN STOP THEM.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Biggest house building programme for a generation with priority for first-time buyers and their stamp duty cut to zero. Secure, three-year rents capped by inflation.
Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs
Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and increase student grants by £400
Reverse the Tory tax break for millionaires

mentions.tacticalSituation: UKIP ARE PLANNING TO PROP UP A TORY GOVERNMENT. A VOTE FOR ANYONE BUT LABOUR RISKS FIVE MORE YEARS OF THE TORIES.

issues.education: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and increase student grants by £400
issues.health: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs

housing.content: Biggest house building programme for a generation with priority for first-time buyers and their stamp duty cut to zero. Secure, three-year rents capped by inflation.

images.caption: IS THIS WHAT YOU WANT TO WAKE UP TO ON FRIDAY MORNING? THE TORIES ARE PLOTTING A SECRET DEAL WITH UKIP. ONLY A VOTE FOR LABOUR CAN STOP THEM.
